client.comment: Client-only settings - If you're looking for general settings, look inside your worlds serverconfig folder!

enableTooltips.comment: Show item descriptions on Shift and controls on Ctrl.

enableOverstressedTooltip.comment: Display a tooltip when looking at overstressed components.

explainRenderErrors.comment: Log a stack-trace when rendering issues happen within a moving contraption.

comment: Higher density means more spawned particles.
Maximum Distance to the player at which items in Blocks' filter slots will be displayed
Choose the menu row that the Create config button appears on in the main menu
Set to 0 to disable the button altogether
Offset the Create config button in the main menu by this many pixels on the X axis
The sign (-/+) of this value determines what side of the row the button appears on (left/right)
Choose the menu row that the Create config button appears on in the in-game menu
Set to 0 to disable the button altogether
Offset the Create config button in the in-game menu by this many pixels on the X axis
The sign (-/+) of this value determines what side of the row the button appears on (left/right)

ignoreFabulousWarning.comment: Setting this to true will prevent Create from sending you a warning when playing with Fabulous graphics enabled

rotateWhenSeated.comment: Disable to prevent being rotated while seated on a Moving Contraption

fluidFogSettings.comment: Configure your vision range when submerged in Create's custom fluids

comment: The vision range through honey will be multiplied by this factor
The vision range though chocolate will be multiplied by this factor
Offset the overlay from goggle- and hover- information by this many pixels on the respective axis; Use /create overlay
Offset the overlay from goggle- and hover- information by this many pixels on the respective axis; Use /create overlay

customColorsOverlay.comment: Enable this to use your custom colors for the Goggle- and Hover- Overlay

comment: The custom background color to use for the Goggle- and Hover- Overlays, if enabled
The custom top color of the border gradient to use for the Goggle- and Hover- Overlays, if enabled
The custom bot color of the border gradient to use for the Goggle- and Hover- Overlays, if enabled

enableAmbientSounds.comment: Make cogs rumble and machines clatter.

comment: Maximum volume modifier of Ambient noise

syncJeiSearch.comment: Whether to auto-update the JEI search when searching in the stock keeper UI

comment: How far away the Camera should zoom when seated on a train

showTrackGraphOnF3.comment: Display nodes and edges of a Railway Network while f3 debug mode is active

showExtendedTrackGraphOnF3.comment: Additionally display materials of a Rail Network while f3 debug mode is active

showTrainMapOverlay.comment: Display Track Networks and Trains on supported map mods
